data.eml:eml: Revalidation of Acanthinozodium Denis, 1966 with description of three new species and discovery of a remarkable male palpal character (Araneae, Zodariidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rudy Jocqué, Arnaud Henrard (2015): Revalidation of Acanthinozodium Denis, 1966 with description of three new species and discovery of a remarkable male palpal character (Araneae, Zodariidae). European Journal of Taxonomy 114: 1-23, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2015.114
